p: As phytochemical hubs, plants also contain a significant number of nutrients important for health promotion. The use of the undeniable nutritional value of several plants rich in nutrients, vitamins, minerals, and also phenolic compounds in the design of new formulations and promising industrial products is an attractive approach. These bioproducts have been termed as functional foods, nutraceutical, cosmeceutical and dietary supplements [ 25, 26, 27], known to be at the interface between nutrition and medicine [ 28, 29].
